document.full_text: eleven people have died in two days of clashes between rival clans in the tunisian mining town of metlaoui, state television said sunday, with shops looted and set on fire.
document.title: death toll from tunisian clashes reaches 11
lines_and_colors: eleven people have died in two days of clashes between rival clans in the tunisian mining town of metlaoui, state television said sunday, with shops looted and set on fire.
